name: American Glory
instructions: Add ingredients to a frosted ice-filled highball glass.

name: Apricot Smoothie
instructions:
Mix all ingredients over ice. 7-Up may be used instead of champagne to cut alcohol content if so desired.

For a little different taste use apple juice instead of orange juice.

name: Atheist's Best
instructions: Take two glasses. Fill one with champagne and mix the other glass with the specified amounts of the other ingredients. Mix the contents of both glasses. You end up with two glasses of the drink.

name: Aztec
instructions: Pour ingredients into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Bali Hai
instructions: Shake ingredients (except champagne) with cracked ice and pour into a collins glass. Fill with champagne.

name: Blue Tahoe
instructions: Put all ingredients in together followed by the champagne last.

name: Champagne de Mars
instructions: Pour into a wine glass.

name: Champagne Lemon
instructions: Pour into a champagne saucer, and serve.

name: Champagne Napoleon
instructions: Stir the mandarine napoleon with orange juice and ice, briefly, and strain into a frosted champagne flute. Add the champagne, and serve.

name: Champagne Passion
instructions: Pour passion fruit puree into a champagne saucer and stir in the simple syrup (to taste). Slowly add the champagne whilst stirring gently. Float the alize on top, and serve.

name: Champagne Tropicale
instructions: Pour the mango puree into a mixing glass, then slowly add the champagne whilst stirring gently. Float the maraschino on top, and serve.

name: D'Artagnan
instructions: Chill the teaspoon amounts of liquor in a mixing glass and strain into a champagne flute. Top with champagne, add strips of orange peel, and serve.

name: Fizzy Fuzzy Navel
instructions: Pour schnapps and orange juice over 2 ice cubes. Fill with champagne and stir gently.

name: Flirtini
instructions: Muddle the pineapple pieces and cointreau in the bottom of a mixing glass. Add vodka and pineapple juice and stir. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and top with champagne. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Great Idea
instructions: Dissolve syrup in juices, add champagne, and serve.

name: Green Dragon Cocktail
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, garnish with a green maraschino cherry, and serve.

name: Happy Hollander
instructions: Pour into a wine glass half-filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Hotel California
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled pina colada glass. Add champagne, straws, and serve.

name: I.B.U.
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) over ice cubes in a shaker, and strain into a champagne flute. Fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Irish Lady
instructions: Almost fill a champagne flute with champagne. Add midori and orange juice, and serve.

name: Kiwi Sparkle
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, and serve.

name: London Bus
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute, add a cherry, and serve.

name: Midori Mimosa
instructions: Pour midori melon liqueur and sweet and sour mix into a champagne flute. Add champagne.

name: Mimosa
instructions: Pour orange juice into a collins glass over two ice cubes. Fill with chilled champagne, stir very gently, and serve.

name: Mustique Whammy
instructions: Shake all but champagne, and strain into a wine glass. Add the champagne.

name: Passat
instructions: Pour into a champagne saucer. Garnish with a cherry and a lemon slice.

name: Passion Mimosa
instructions: Pour passion fruit juice into a champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne, decorate with a strawberry, and serve.

name: Peach Treat
instructions: Shake brandy and orange juice with ice and strain into a collins glass over several ice cubes. Top with chilled champagne, add the peach slice, and serve.

name: Pernod Fizz
instructions: Pour into a wine glass three-quarters filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry and orange slice, and serve.

name: Pink Millenium
instructions: Mix vodka, cranberry juice and sugar syrup, and pour into a champagne coupe or flute. Fill with champagne or a dry sparkling wine.

name: Player's Passion
instructions: Pour pre-chilled ingredients in order into a champagne saucer. Stir, and serve.

name: Poinsettia
instructions: Mix the champagne and cranberry juice, then float the Grand Marnier on top.

name: Pompey Royale
instructions: Dissolve sugar in juices, and add to a champagne saucer with champagne and syrup.

name: Pyrenees Greeting
instructions: Pour into a champagne flute. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Ritz Bar Fizz
instructions: Pour into a champagne saucer. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a cherry, and serve.

name: San Remo
instructions: Pour into a wine glass, garnish with slices of grapefruit and mandarin, and serve.

name: Savoy Affair
instructions: Rim a double-cocktail glass with lime and caster sugar. Pour ingredients into the sugar-rimmed glass, garnish with a sugar-dipped strawberry, and serve.

name: Sparkling Hunt Punch
instructions: Chill all ingredients (except champagne) and strain into a champagne flute. Top with champagne, and serve.

name: This is the Night
instructions: Pour into a double-cocktail glass half-filled with broken ice, and serve.

name: Tropical Champagne
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute, carefully fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Valencia #2
instructions: Shake the apricot brandy, orange juice and bitters with ice and strain into a chilled champagne flute. Top with champagne, garnish with flamed orange peel, and serve.
